context_bundle.summary: Safe inter-agent messaging via AHK. Write message to temp file first, AHK reads from file. Avoids quote escaping hell. NEVER inline messages in scripts.

onboarding.quick_start: 1) Write message to temp file. 2) Call: AutoHotkey64.exe 'X:\AHK  SCRIPTS\send_to_agent.ahk' HWND filepath. 3) AHK reads file, pastes, enters. NO QUOTE ESCAPING IN CODE.
common_patterns: Write msg to temp file first - NO QUOTE ESCAPING
known_errors: NEVER inline message in AHK script - quote escaping WILL fail
NEVER use PowerShell string interpolation for messages
ALWAYS write to temp file first, pass filepath to AHK

kalic_scripts.notes: WSL->cmd.exe quoting breaks multi-word args. File-based method bypasses entirely. AHK reads from file, no argument parsing.
